text: Diana Hyland (January 25, 1936 â€“ March 27, 1977) was an American television, stage and movie actress. She played Joan Bradford in the television series Eight is Enough. She also played Adrianna Prescott in Happy Days. Hyland began acting in 1955 at age 19. She appeared in television series, including Eleventh Hour, The Invaders and The Twilight Zone. In Peyton Place, she played Susan Winter. Hyland was born in Cleveland Heights, Ohio. She died of breast cancer in Los Angeles, California at age 41. == Other websites == * Category:1936 births Category:1977 deaths Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:Actors from Ohio
title: Diana Hyland
